name: Cubic Island
description:
STORY

Jair prepared to go camping in another state, in his hands carries a photo of unknown origin describing a sequence of symbols, determined to go there by boat. But in the middle of the trip, he caught a storm and ended up trapped on an island, not knowing where he is? How to get out of there? And still unable to warn anyone. You'll have a lot of adventure, a lot of suspense and a lot of fun.

CONTROLS

-W A S D- Move The Character;

-SHIFT - Run;

-SPACE-BAR - Jump;

- X - Attack ;
